unnormalised: Hey folks, these solar rooftop subsidies seem promising! Wondering if anyone in Bangalore has availed them? Heard MNRE is pushing for it. Rs. 50,000 might just cover a good chunk, no? Gotta check with Tata Power. Imagine, free electricity during Diwali – no more feeling guilty about the extra lights! Next step: solar-powered biryani cooking! Onam bonus for the planet! 2kW should be enough for my needs, I think.
